bibl.title: Study of Conservation of the Necropolis of El Bagawat.
bibl.note: Study of a mud brick and stone of the necropolis of El Bagawat in Kharga Oasis, Egypt. - Introduction. - Historical View. - The Construction System. - The Damages Affecting the Chapels. - Petrographic Study.
bibl.seg: AHMED AWAD Mohamed Ahmed, Study of Conservation of the Necropolis of El Bagawat.

Nicola BONACASA, Maria CASINI e Ahmed ETMAN (a cura di), Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano] (Cairo, s.d.) pp. 73-84, 2 tabl., 8 figg.

Study of a mud brick and stone of the necropolis of El Bagawat in Kharga Oasis, Egypt. - Introduction. - Historical View. - The Construction System. - The Damages Affecting the Chapels. - Petrographic Study.
